participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with a friend who shares my love of healthy food and music
i play drums in a band.
i collect comic books.
I used to be more spontaneous with my painting.
i talk very fast.

participant_2.background:
My favorite place to eat is my local sushi bar because I love trying new things and their sushi is always fresh and delicious.
I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i do not have many friends.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

content.text: Hi how are you doing?
I'm doing alright, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
That's good to hear.
What are your hobbies?
I like to play basketball, take pictures, and eat sushi.
I love sushi too! What's your favorite kind?
I like the classic California roll, but I also like to try new things.
I like to try new things too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to festivals and concerts. I also like to play video games.
I love video games too! I'm a big fan of the Zelda series.
I've never played Zelda, but I've heard good things about it.
You should give it a try! It's a really fun series.
I will! I'm always looking for new games to play.
Me too! I love exploring new worlds and meeting new characters.
Same here! I love getting lost in a good game.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and escape from the real world.
Absolutely! I need to get back to work, but it was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too! Have a great day!
You too!
